title: Retailer responsibility
context: [ยง339D-5] Retailer responsibility. Beginning January 1, 2010, retailers shall make available to their customers information on collection services in the State, including the department&rsquo;s website and toll-free telephone number. Remote retailers may include this information in a visible location on their website to fulfill this requirement. [L Sp 2008, c 13, pt of ยง2]
